name: Umbral Crown
description:
Umbral Crown

When Hell rose from the eternal darkness... demons were created with it. Who will prove to be the strongest demon across all 9 Circles?

Umbral Crown is a 2D roguelike with cute chibi graphics and anime styled art following the demon princes in their journey through Hell. 

* Downloadable standalone version is recommended

- 1hr gameplay
- 3 endings (credits follow true end)
- Randomly generated levels with unique enemies and bosses

Developer

WatermelonOwl
